widget.name: Moroccan Streaming
widget.description:
Moroccan Streaming is a basic Radio player that allows you to listen the Maroccan radio stations.
The list of radio stations available on this application:
Radio plus Agadir , Chada FM , Radio Yabiladi , Radio 2M , Radio Mars , Atlantic Radio, Med Radio , Radio Medi 1 , Hit Radio , Cap Radio , Luxe Radio , Radio Al Amazighia , Radio Aswat , Radio Assadisa , Radio Medina , Izlanzik Radio , Idaa Al Watania , Radio Chaine Inter , Radio Maroc Music , Radio Sawa , Radio Anwarock , Radio Plus Marrakech , Radio Itma , Ness Radio , Radio Monte Carlo Doualiya , Aktab Radio , Radio Only Rai , Rif Melody Radio , Radio Planet House , Radio Soleil , Radio Air du Mboa , Mfm Radio , Radio Habayiib , Radio Star Maroc , Radio Marocfan , Hit Radio Buzz , Hit Radio MGHARBA , Hit Radio RnB , Hit Radio Dancefloor
widget.author: Ahmed BOUSSANANE
